title: Revenue of Mattel 's Barbie brand worldwide from 2012 to 2019
yAxis: Gross sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Gross sales in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Gross sales in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, and finally roughly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Gross sales in million U.S. dollars, about 1202.8 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Gross sales in million U.S. dollars, of value 905.9 was reported at Year 2015
